div.p: District policies, minutes and mission statement are only a small portion of the background information you are able to find here. For more, click above.
Our Middle School and High School provide an enriching educational experience for grades 6 through 12. See more here!
Where the learning begins! Click on the link to discover more and to stay updated with our Elementary.

Tri-Central Community Schools would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore the new web space by checking out some of our new features including: calendars, news, and messages from our superintendent and principals. Subscribe to our Facebook, Twitter, or YouTube Channel feeds to receive updates on school and district information!

Tri-Central Community Schools do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Tri-Central Community Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
